attributes.review: I would give this zero stars if I could. This app is constantly crashing on my brand new iPhone 11. It keeps glitching as well so I can’t even use it for what it’s intended for! I have perfect WiFi and it keeps saying it cannot connect to my WiFi. Stupid! Once it even started flashing uncontrollably! Do you know how dangerous that is for people with seizure conditions? Do not download this app. It is a waste of time and space!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP DON’T DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: A president that continues to promote his OWN self interest does not belong in power. A true president listens to his people, weather they share his views or not. Communication on differing ideas promotes growth. Donald Trump chooses to silence those who disagree with him and remains blinded to an America that wants to grow. Grow beyond racism, beyond fascism, beyond “complete loyalty” because different people have different ideas and by combining those ideas is how we become ideal. #anyonebuttrump2020

attributes.review: Almost instantly upon downloading, my phone started glitching. Apps weren’t opening properly, and it kept turning off and on. The app asked for my contact info (which I did enter so that I could access the app) and now I’m receiving calls and texts throughout the night. I think the company sold my phone number to telemarketers, or the company itself is contacting me. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Awful!
